settings.heading: Shipping policy
settings.description:
The cost includes a sourcing fee for your selected item. Please note that all sales for made-to-order items are final, and we don't offer refunds or exchanges. For queries, contact us at info@dorhe.in

By placing an order, you agree to these terms and enter into a binding agreement with us. Once processed, you'll receive an email with tracking information. We reserve the right to cancel orders due to information verification or incorrect stock levels.

Customs, taxes, and duties are not our responsibility. If you decline a package, you're liable for return shipping, taxes, duties, and customs charges. Vintage items may show wear.

Dorhe is not liable for lost or stolen packages; claims must be made to the carrier. Import duties or taxes are your responsibility; contact local authorities for details.Â
